titleStmt.title: Causes of a publike fast, and solemne humiliation to be kept throughout the Church of Scotland upon the last Sabbath of this instant month of July, being the 25. day thereof 1647.
titleStmt.author: Church of Scotland. General Assembly.
Ker, A.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Evan Tyler, printer to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie,
